        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>promethean</catalog>
            <entry>10100</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en-US">What is an adjective?</string>
          </title>
          <language>en-US</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en-US">This flipchart is designed to help students understand what an adjective is. They will have the opportunity to identify adjectives in sentences and paragraphs. The flipchart contains pictures where students can write adjectives to describe the picture, and also ACTIVote questions about adjectives.</string>
          </description>

          </keyword>
